content:
Sure, here are seven potential members of a questing party of powerful female demigods, that are original characters, a good mix of both Roman and Greek demigods, and above the age of 18.

1. Adira, a demigod daughter of Neptune, who has the ability to control and manipulate the ocean, as well as being able to communicate with sea creatures.
2. Seraphina, a demigod daughter of Zeus, who has the power to control and manipulate weather and can summon lightning bolts.
3. Ravenna, a demigod daughter of Pluto, who has the power to control and manipulate death and souls.
4. Calantha, a demigod daughter of Athena, who is a skilled warrior and tactician, and has the power to control and manipulate wind, which could be useful for both combat and transportation.
5. Zoë Nightshade, a demigod daughter of Atlas, and a huntress of Artemis, who will be able to provide a skilled fighting capabilities, as well as knowledge and experience of the wilderness.
6. Aurora, a demigod daughter of Apollo, who has the power to control and manipulate the aurora borealis, which can be used for both combat and navigation.
7. Aria, a demigod daughter of Ares, who is a skilled warrior and has the power to control and manipulate sound, which could be useful for both combat and reconnaissance.

It's worth noting that the abilities you have mentioned are quite rare and powerful, but that's the beauty of fiction, it allows you to create powerful characters that can make your story more interesting. With the diversity of powers and abilities, this questing party would be able to handle different challenges that they might face on their mission.
